thread.title: Family heartbroken after late brother's ex wrongly claimed he was the father of her baby
thread.title_full: Family heartbroken after late brother's ex wrongly claimed he was the father of her baby

author: Alistair McGeorge
title: Family heartbroken after late brother's ex wrongly claimed he was the father of her baby
text:
Family heartbroken after late brother's ex wrongly claimed he was the father of her baby The Jeremy Kyle Show guest claimed she's "99.9% sure" Sean was the father Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Heartbreaking moment man told he's not a child's father Share this video Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
A guest on The Jeremy Kyle Show urged the family of her late former flame to be there for their baby following his tragic motorbike accident. 
Jess insisted to Sean - who passed away in April - that she was "99.9% sure" he was the father of her baby, but a DNA test on his brother Rob revealed he wasn't the dad. 
Speaking about the fatal accident, Jess emotionally told the daytime TV host: "It broke me. I couldn't accept it. I just kept thinking about the baby." Jess told Sean's family she was sure he was the father (Photo: ITV) Sean's brother Rob was used for a DNA test (Photo: ITV) 
While Sean was happy to think he could be a dad, there were rumours claiming she told as many as seven people they could be the father, although she insisted she only told three. His family were heartbroken (Photo: ITV) Jess told three men they could be the dad (Photo: ITV) 
His sister Stacey admitted to having doubts, adding: "I don't think the baby looks like him at all." 
She said: "The thing that got me is you looked my mum and dad in the eye and said it was Sean's baby." Rob was also devastated (Photo: ITV) Sean's family weren't convinced (Photo: ITV) 
It was also revealed that Sean's brother Rob visits the child everyday, and insisted he wants to know if it's his nephew. 
He added it's an extension of his brother, and has been bonding with the son - leaving him heartbroken at the revelation. Like us on Facebook
